alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 3:20PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Holt County through 400 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Page to 8 miles east of Chambers. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`neill, Ewing, Page, Inman, Knievels Corner and Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 309 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 160 and 182. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
